title: Hour 1 - Chris Mannix (06-15-20)
itunes:title: Hour 1 - Chris Mannix (06-15-20)
description:
Chris Mannix talks to Dan about the social platform issue brought up by NBA players. Some players have expressed their concerns about returning to play in Orlando during the Black Lives Matter movement.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
